name: stardust
short_effect: Sell for 1000 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 2000 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.black_white: Lovely, red-colored sand with a loose, silky feel. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Lovely, red-colored sand with a loose, silky feel. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
